title: Sam Bankman-Fried Sort of Had a Rough Day
description: Yesterday was arguably not a great day for Sam Bankman-Fried. First, the judge overseeing his case rejected all seven of his proposed expert witnesses*, questioning at least one’s qualifications and saying some others really wouldn’t be relevant to the case.

title: Bitcoin’s cycle transition is underway as indicator shows possible market bottom
description:
Quick Take Recent analyses of Bitcoin’s RHODL Ratio have provided an intriguing perspective on the capital rotation dynamics during cycle transitions. The RHODL Ratio, developed as a ratio of single-cycle long-term holders (6 months to 3 years) to the youngest short-term holders (1 day to 3 months), offers us an invaluable analytical tool to examine […]

The post Bitcoin’s cycle transition is underway as indicator shows possible market bottom appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: FTX seeks $157.3M in legal action against former employees from Hong Kong affiliate
description:
FTX has filed a legal action to recover $157.3 million from the former employees of its Hong Kong affiliate, Salameda, according to a Sept. 21 court filing. The insolvent exchange named former Salameda staffers Michael Burgess, Lesley Burgess, Kevin Nguyen, Darren Wong, and Matthew Burgess as the defendants. The legal action also encompasses 3Twelve Ventures […]

The post FTX seeks $157.3M in legal action against former employees from Hong Kong affiliate appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: LBank Launchpad to Host $UMM Token Sale
description: LBank is gearing up for its second Launchpad project, MetaExpand. The $UMM token will be distributed after the Launchpad ends on September 28 and it will then be listed on LBank on the 29th. MetaExpand follows the success of LBank’s debut Launchpad token, $PINS, which soared by 20x.

title: POLY Price Prediction 2023-2032: Is Polymath a Good Investment?

title: Bitmain injects $54m into bankrupt Bitcoin miner Core Scientific
description: Bitmain is investing $53.9 million in Core Scientific, the bankrupt Bitcoin miner, as part of an ongoing supply contract

title: Moscow court sentences ex-BTC-e administrator to 3.5 years in prison

title: Crypto Analyst Issues Bitcoin Alert, Says BTC Could Dip Further if History Repeats Itself – Here Are His Targets
description:
